confirmation.subject: Do You need help?
confirmation.bodyLine2: Your help request was well noted. Now many of volunteers will see it based on your location. You will be contacted by us via email, once we find a match.
confirmation.socialMediaReference: Our mission works, if all of us using it. Spread the word, and tell others about us.
confirmation.closingLine: Stay home, stay healthy and wash your hands!

helpNotification.subject: Someone offered help!
helpNotification.introLine: Hey. We have found a very enthusiastic volunteer. This person wants, to help You. Read his messages below.
helpNotification.closingLine: Stay home, stay healthy and wash your hands!

emailSubscriptionConfirmation.subject: Thank You
emailSubscriptionConfirmation.emailIntroduction: We have just received a request for helping around You. Click on the button, and if You can apply!
emailSubscriptionConfirmation.socialMediaReference: Our mission works, if all of us using it. Spread the word, and tell others about us.
emailSubscriptionConfirmation.closingLine: Stay home, stay healthy and wash your hands!
